籤詩版本二:
M’mbuyomo, ndinataya singano m’bwato langa, koma tsopano ndikuifunafunabe m’nyanja.
Ngati singano yapachiyambi ikupezeka, idzatenga nthawi yambiri ndi khama.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ili ngati kuyang'ana singano m'nyanja.
Chilichonse chimafuna khama.
解曰: Mwayi ndiye maziko amwayi. Lu ndi mbewu ya dalitso. Fotokozani momveka bwino. Ndikoyenera kukhala osamala.
籤詩故事一:
◇Huang Xiaozi adasaka abale ake mtunda wamakilomita masauzande ambiri
Huang Juejing anali wochokera ku Jianchang. Pamene anali ndi zaka zisanu, amayi ake anamwalira chifukwa cha nkhondo. Patapita nthawi, analumbira kumwamba kubwereza malemba a Chibuda kuti apeze amayi ake. Kenako anawoloka mtsinje wa Huaihe n’kupita kukapemphapempha.Analimbana ndi mphepo ndi mvula komanso anapirira mavuto, ndipo patapita zaka 28 anafika ku Chundian, m’chigawo cha Liang, mumzinda wa Ruzhou, kumene anapeza mayi ake n’kubwerera.
聖意: Nyumbayo sibwino kwa inu, samalani kufunafuna chuma, kuchita dili, ndi ukwati Liujia imatchinga oyenda pansi ndikusunga anthu kumunda, mphutsi za silika ndi zabwino, osaweta, zovuta kupeza anthu. ndikovuta kusuma mlandu Ndikoyenera kusamuka Ndikoyenera kusamutsa katundu wotayika.Ndizovuta kuchira ku matenda oopsa.Kukhazikika kwakanthawi kumanda amapiri.
古人: Huang Xiaozi adasaka abale ake mtunda wamakilomita masauzande ambiri
第X籤: Makumi asanu ndi limodzi mphambu atatu kupambana lotale
